page.title: 18A DAY IN MY LIFE
page.content: I USUALLY WAKE UP AT AROUND SEVEN O CLOCK AND GO DOWNSTAIRS FOR BREAKFAST. AFTER BREAKFAST I USUALLY FINISH MY HOMEWORK OR LISTEN TO THE RADIO. AT AROUND 8.30 I LEAVE AND WALK TO SCHOOL. MY WALK TO SCHOOL IS ABOUT 3/4 OF A MILE. I ARRIVE AT SCHOOL AT ABOUT 8.45 AND AT 8.55 THE BELL GOES FOR ASSEMBLY.AFTER ASSEMBLY WE GO TO REGISTRATION AND THEN ON TO OUR FIRST FOUR MORNING LESSONS. DINNER IS AT 11.50 AND THERE ARE TWO PRIORITIES,SENIOR AND JUNIOR. AFTER AFTERNOON REGISTRATION WE GO TO OUR FOUR AFTERNOON LESSONS. AT 3.30 I WALK HOME. IF IT IS RAINING MY DAD PICKS ME UP.AFTER TEA I DO MY HOMEWORK. THEN I GO SHOPPING FOR MY PARENTS.ON WEDNESDAY NIGHTS I TAKE THE DOG TO DOG TRAINING,AFTER THIS I GO TO BED. MICHELLE MOUNTSTEPHEN.
